description:
Are thinking & acting like an 'Employee' or an 'Entrepreneur'?

Discover if you have all THREE core foundations rock solid so you can really grow your business!

Too many times new business owners & entrepreneurs can really hold themselves back by still acting like they work in a corporate or traditional job.

But it takes a very different set of thinking & action to really be your own boss.

During this course, you'll get to learn how to ensure you have got your DESIGN, MINDSETS & STRATEGIES working for you & your business (using the Rapid Transformation Formula).

You'll get an introduction to toolkits such as Wealth Dynamics, Talent Dynamics & Neuro Linguistic Programming (NLP).

It's not all 'theory' but instead real practice & tips that will help you really make a big difference straight away.

As part of the course, you'll get access to an 'audit' to see how solid your business (or idea) currently is & then what you can do to strengthen it further.
title: Start or grow your business: From Employee to Entrepreneur
